name: powo-cli
description: Node module to import Powo translation into your web project.

scripts.test-load-by-modules: node ./bin/load-by-modules.js --delivery="PayPortal Front" --modules="PayPortal,PayPortal Payment Config,PayPortal Back Module" --platform=web --versions=draft  --proxy=http://p-goodway.rd.francetelecom.fr:8080 --languages=fr,en,pt --location=src/app/i18n
scripts.test-load-by-modules:noproxy: node ./bin/load-by-modules.js --delivery="PayPortal Front" --modules="PayPortal,PayPortal Payment Config,PayPortal Back Module" --platform=web --versions=draft  --languages=fr,en,pt --location=src/app/i18n

author: orange
